classRec.name: Data
classRec.description: Arbitrary data wrapped in helper methods.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: Data
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: object Primitive Object to consume and use as the base for this Data object.

method.name: create
method.description: Creates a Data object from a primitive Object.
method.param: object Target primitive Object.

method.name: del
method.description: Delete a field.
method.param: field The field to delete.

method.name: has
method.description: Returns true if the field is defined on this object.
method.param: field The field to check for.

method.name: merge
method.description: Merge this Data with another set of Data and return the combined result.
method.param: data The Data to be merged with.

method.name: get
method.description: Get a value.
method.param: field The name of the field to get the value of.
fallback Fallback value to use if the field is undefined.

method.name: set
method.description: Set a value.
method.param: field The field to set the value of.
value The value to assign to the target field.

interfaceRec.name: IDeconstructs
interfaceRec.description:
A contract for an object defining a deconstructor - code used to aid in correct garbage
collection.
interfaceRec.author: Marty Wallace.

interfaceRec.name: IStorable
interfaceRec.description: An object that can be saved as an object and loaded from an object.
interfaceRec.author: Marty Wallace.

interfaceRec.name: IMouseDataProvider
interfaceRec.description: An object that is able to provide data based on the state of the user's mouse.
interfaceRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: mouseContainer
method.description: Returns the graphics object used as the 'container' for the mouse.

interfaceRec.name: IServiceable
interfaceRec.description:
A contract defining an object that can be associated with one or more Services. Typically, a
ServiceManager will be used to manage that relationship.
interfaceRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: getService
method.description: Returns a Service that is servicing this object.
method.param: serviceName The name of the Service, represented by its 'name' getter.
method.csharp: Improvement opportunity: public T GetService(string name) where T : new(), Service.

classRec.name: ServiceManager
classRec.description: Manages the relationship between a collection of Services and an IServiceable.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: ServiceManager
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: serviceable The object to be serviced.

method.name: deconstruct
method.description: Deconstruct this ServiceManager and all of the Services it manages.

method.name: getService
method.description: Gets a Service with the specified name.
method.param: name The name of the Service to search for.

method.name: update
method.description: Updates all of the Services managed by this.

classRec.name: Thing
classRec.description:
The core object within Sentienl, a Thing is able to access all of the core game components.
Things are also able to be added to parent Things and contain their own children Things.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: __addT
method.description: Internal alias for addT().

method.name: __removeT
method.description: Internal alias for removeT().

method.name: addT
method.description: Add a child Thing to this Thing.
method.param: thing The Thing to add.

method.name: addedT
method.description: Called when this Thing is added to another Thing.
method.param: to The Thing this Thing was added to.

method.name: deconstruct
method.description: Deconstruct this Thing and its descendants.

method.name: getChildAt
method.description: Returns a child Thing at a given index.
method.param: index The index to check.

method.name: load
method.description: Loads some save data obtained via Thing.save() and attempt to apply it to this Thing.
method.param: data The data to load.

method.name: removeAll
method.description: Remove all children from this Thing.
method.param: destroy Whether to also deconstruct() all removed Things.

method.name: removeFromParent
method.description: Remove this Thing from its parent, if it has one.
method.param: destroy Whether to also deconstruct() this Thing.

method.name: removeT
method.description: Remove a child Thing from this Thing.
method.param: thing The Thing to remove.
destroy Whether to also deconstruct() the target Thing.

method.name: removedT
method.description: Called when this Thing is removed from another Thing.
method.param: from The Thing this Thing was removed from.

method.name: save
method.description: Saves a simple representation of this Thing as an Object.

method.name: update
method.description: Update this Thing and its descendants.

method.name: audio
method.description: A reference to the game Audio service.

method.name: children
method.description: Returns the list of child Things. This is the actual list - be very careful what you do with it.

method.name: className
method.description: The full class name of this Thing.

method.name: game
method.description: A reference to the core Game class.

method.name: id
method.description: A unique ID number assigned to this Thing by the core Game class.

method.name: keyboard
method.description: A reference to the game Keyboard service.

method.name: library
method.description: A reference to the game Library service.

method.name: mouse
method.description: A reference to the game Mouse service.

method.name: parent
method.description: The parent Thing, if this Thing has one.

method.name: storage
method.description: A reference to the game Storage service.

method.name: viewport
method.description: A reference to the game Viewport service.

classRec.name: Service
classRec.description: Describes a service provided to an IServiceable.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: game
method.description: A reference to the core game object.

method.name: name
method.description: Returns the name of this service.

method.name: serviceable
method.description: The object being serviced by this Service.

classRec.name: State
classRec.description:
A State is used to define a game state e.g. the main menu, settings screen, game over screen,
the gameplay itself, etc.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

classRec.name: Library
classRec.description: The Library manages game assets e.g. textures, sprite sheets and sound.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

classRec.name: BaseGame
classRec.description: The core game class passed to the constructor of sentinel.framework.Core. This is the base class for your main game class and should contain logic for initializing assets and the starting state.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: getInstance
method.description: Returns a reference to the core game class.

method.name: loadState
method.description: Loads a new State. Unloads the current state, if one is set.
method.param: state The new State to load.

method.name: audio
method.description: Reference to the Audio service.

method.name: identity
method.description: The game identity string.

method.name: keyboard
method.description: Reference to the Keyboard service.

method.name: library
method.description: Reference to the Library service.

method.name: mouse
method.description: Reference to the Mouse service.

method.name: starling
method.description: Reference to the current Starling instance.

method.name: state
method.description: Reference to the current active State.

method.name: storage
method.description: Reference to the Storage service.

method.name: viewport
method.description: Reference to the Viewport service.

classRec.name: Core
classRec.description: The Sentinel core, extended by your document class.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: Core
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: main Your main game class, extending sentinel.framework.Game.

antiAliasing The anti-aliasing level used in rendering Starling graphics. This
value should be between 0 and 16.
debug Whether or not to show the Starling debug box.

classRec.name: MouseState
classRec.description: Stores information about the state of the user's mouse at a given point in time.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: available
method.description: Whether or not the cursor is within the viewport.

method.name: left
method.description: Whether or not the left mouse button is held down.

method.name: right
method.description: Whether or not the right mouse button is held down.

method.name: viewportPosition
method.description: The position of the mouse pointer relative to the viewport.

classRec.name: KeyboardState
classRec.description: Stores information about the state of the user's keyboard at a given point in time.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: areDown
method.description: Determine whether all the keys in the specified list are held down.
method.param: keys A list of key codes to check.

method.name: isDown
method.description: Determine whether the specified key is held down.
method.param: keyCode The key code to check.

method.name: xAreDown
method.description: Determine whether X or more keys in the specified list are held down.
method.param: keys A list of key codes to check.
x The required amount of keys in the list.

method.name: keysDown
method.description: The total number of keys being held down.

classRec.name: Keyboard
classRec.description:
The Keyboard class provides access to the current state of the user's keyboard. It also
provides useful constants for ASCII values.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

Event.name: keyReleased
Event.description: Dispatched when a key has been released on the Keyboard.

Event.name: keyPressed
Event.description: Dispatched when a key has been pressed on the Keyboard.

method.name: getState
method.description: Gets the current keyboard state as a KeyboardState object.

classRec.name: Mouse
classRec.description: The Mouse class provides access to the current state of the mouse buttons.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

Event.name: rightUp
Event.description: Dispatched when the right mouse button is released.

Event.name: rightDown
Event.description: Dispatched when the right mouse button is pressed.

Event.name: leftUp
Event.description: Dispatched when the left mouse button is released.

Event.name: leftDown
Event.description: Dispatched when the left mouse button is pressed.

method.name: getPositionIn
method.description: Returns the position of the mouse within a given IMouseDataProvider.
method.param: target The mouse data provider to get the mouse position within.

method.name: getState
method.description: Returns the current state of the mouse buttons as a MouseState object.

method.name: viewportPosition
method.description: Returns the current position of the mouse relative to the game viewport.

classRec.name: Storage
classRec.description: Local storage via SharedObject.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: empty
method.description: Empty the current block.

method.name: load
method.description: Load data from the current active block.
method.param: field The field to load data from within the block.
fallback Fallback data to use if the field was not defined on the block.

method.name: save
method.description: Save data into the current active block.
method.param: field The field to assign the data to within the block.
data The data to assign.

method.name: blockName
method.description: The name associated with the current block.

method.name: block
method.description: The current block number.

method.name: name
method.description: The service name.

classRec.name: EngineQueryResult
classRec.description: Result data obtained from using a query method on a physics Engine instance.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: EngineQueryResult
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: fixture The Fixture of interest for this result.
point The point of interest for this result. In a queryLine() call, this will be the point of intersection.
point2 A secondary point of interest. In a queryLine() call, this will be the normal.

method.name: fixture
method.description: The Fixture of interest.

method.name: point2
method.description: The secondary point of interest.

method.name: point
method.description: The primary point of interest.

method.name: EngineDef
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: gravity Gravity values for the physics world. Defaults to zero gravity.
sleep Whether or not the world will attempt to put objects to sleep.
velocityIterations The number of iterations used to smooth out velocities. Higher values are slower but give more accurate results.
positionIterations The number of iterations used to smooth out positions. Higher values are slower by give more accurate results.

classRec.name: Shape
classRec.description: Defines a shape used by a Fixture.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

classRec.name: Vector2D
classRec.description: A Vector in 2D space.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.
classRec.csharp: I'll be glad to not have to mess around with Vector2D -> Point -> Vector2D conversions.

method.name: Vector2D
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: x The vector value along the x axis.
y The vector value along the y axis.

method.name: cast
method.description: Returns a new Vector2D whose x and y values are a given angle and distance from this Vector2D.
method.param: angle The angle to cast at.
distance The distance to cast.

method.name: inDirection
method.description: Creates a Vector2D whose x and y values represent a given direction.
method.param: angle The direction angle.
length The distance along the given direction angle.

method.name: load
method.description: Loads the values of a simple representation of a Vector2D into this Vector2D.
method.param: data The data to load from.

method.name: save
method.description: Saves a simple representation of this Vector2D.

method.name: setTo
method.description: Simultaneously assing new x and y values to this Vector2D.
method.param: x The new x axis value.
y The new y axis value.

classRec.name: BodyData
classRec.description: Used to bind a native b2Body to a Sentinel Body and an owner.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

classRec.name: Box
classRec.description: A box shape.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: Fixture
method.description: Internal - Use B2Body.createFixture().

classRec.name: Body
classRec.description: Represents a physics body, typically attached to a Being.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: Body
method.description: Constructor - internal usage only - do not call this method directly.
method.param: engine The Engine creating this Body.
body The internal b2Body.
def The internal b2BodyDef.
owner The Being that owns this Body.

method.name: position
method.description: Returns the position of this Body. Modifying the x or y values of the result will not affect this Body, use moveTo() instead.

classRec.name: ContactListener
classRec.description: Internal generic collision handler.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

classRec.name: Engine
classRec.description: The physics engine core.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: Engine
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: def An optional world definition.
debug An optional debug definition.

method.name: createBody
method.description: Creates a new Body within this physics engine.
method.param: type The body type.
owner The owner of the resulting Body.

method.name: queryLine
method.description: Cast a line through the world and return a list of EngineQueryResults containing data about each intersection made.
method.param: start The line start position.
end The line end position.

method.name: queryPoint
method.description: Query the world for Fixtures who overlap a given point and return a list of EngineQueryResults associated with those Fixtures.
method.param: point The point to check at.

method.name: queryShape
method.description: Query the world for Fixtures who overlap a provided Shape and return a list of EngineQueryResults associated with those Fixtures.
method.param: shape The Shape to use.
position The Shape position.
rotation The Shape rotation.

method.name: step
method.description: Run one step of calculations within the physics world. Should be called each time the game World updates.

method.name: bodies
method.description: Iterate over the list of bodies contained within this physics world and returns them as a Vector<Body>.

method.name: debug
method.description: The Debug instance used by this engine, if any.

method.name: debugging
method.description: Whether or not this engine is in debug mode.

method.name: gravity
method.description: The gravity applies to bodies within the engine.

method.name: scale
method.description: The pixel to metre scaling ratio.

method.name: sleeps
method.description: Whether or not the engine puts bodies to sleep.

method.name: totalBodies
method.description: The total number of bodies being managed by this engine.

classRec.name: Debug
classRec.description: Defines and encapsulates debug drawing for Box2D.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: Debug
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: game A reference to the core Game class.
lineThickness Line thickness of debug graphics.
lineAlpha Line alpha of debug graphics.
fillAlpha Fill alpha of debug graphics.
flags List of drawing flags. If null or empty, B2Debug.SHAPE will be used.

method.name: graphics
method.description: The native Sprite used to render the debug graphics.

method.name: wrapper
method.description: The wrapper Sprite used for rendering debug graphics.

classRec.name: ObjectUtil
classRec.description: Utilities for working with Objects.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: countProperties
method.description: Returns the total number of properties associated with an Object.
method.param: object The target Object.

method.name: merge
method.description:
Merge a collection of Objects. Objects appearing earlier in the list will have their
properties overwritten with those who appear later in the list.
method.param: ...objects The list of Objects to merge.

method.name: prop
method.description: Fetch a property of an object, or a fallback value if the property is not defined.
method.param: target The target object.
prop The property to fetch.
fallback The fallback value to use.

method.name: shallowCopy
method.description: Create a shallow copy of the target Object.
method.param: object The target Object.

classRec.name: Random
classRec.description: Utilities related to random values.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: between
method.description: Generates a random number between two supplied values.
method.param: min Number A.
max Number B.

method.name: fromArray
method.description: Returns a random element from an array.
method.param: array The subject array.

method.name: getAngle
method.description: A random angle, in radians.

method.name: getBase
method.description: A random number between 0 and 1, not including 1.

method.name: inCircle
method.description: Returns a Vector2D whose x and y values are randomly assigned within a circular area.
method.param: x Center x position of the circle.
y Center y position of the circle.
radius Circle radius.

method.name: inRectangle
method.description: Returns a Vector2D whose x and y values are randomly assigned within a rectangular area.
method.param: x X coordinate.
y Y coordinate.
width Rectangle width.
height Rectangle height.

method.name: inRing
method.description: Returns a Vector2D whose x and y values are randomly assigned within a ring.
method.param: x Center x position of the ring.
y Center y position of the ring.
innerRadius The inner ring radius.
outerRadius The outer ring radius.

method.name: roll
method.description: Returns true if a randomly generated value is less than or equal to the supplied value.
method.param: chance Percent chance to return true.

classRec.name: StorageUtil
classRec.description: Utilities for working with IStorable objects.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: saveList
method.description: Generates an array containing the result of calling save() on each item in an input list.
method.param: list The list to work with.

method.name: toStorables
method.description: Attempts to convert an input list type (array, Vector.<T>) to a Vector.<IStorable> list.
method.param: input The input list.

interfaceRec.name: IGroupable
interfaceRec.description:
A contract for a Being who can be named and grouped for referencing. A groupable Being has a
unique name within the group it belongs to.
interfaceRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: groupName
method.description: The name of the group this Being is associated with.

method.name: nameInGroup
method.description: The name of this Being within its group. This must be unique per-group.

interfaceRec.name: IQueryable
interfaceRec.description: A contract describing a Being who can be queried for via the World it is containing in. If a Being does not implement this interface, it will not appear in any listings generated by World.query().
interfaceRec.author: Marty Wallace.

interfaceRec.name: IUnique
interfaceRec.description: An interface used to represent a unique Being within a World.
interfaceRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: uniqueName
method.description: A unique name representing the Being this contract is attached to.

classRec.name: WorldQueryResult
classRec.description: A single result within the list of results provided when querying the World, wrapping a Being and the physics level EngineQueryResult.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: being
method.description: The Being stored within this result.

method.name: query
method.description: A reference to the Query that provided this result.

method.name: options
method.description: Returns the options associated with the query.

method.name: type
method.description: Returns the type of query that was made.

classRec.name: Camera
classRec.description:
The Camera used to view a World, typically centred on the main character. It allows you to
move, rotate and scale the world around a given point.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: lookAt
method.description: Move the camera ontop of a Being within the World.
method.param: being The Being to look at.

classRec.name: BaseMap
classRec.description: A Map defines a collection of Beings, events, quests, etc within a World at one time.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: __update
method.description: Grant access to update() within sentinel.gameplay.world.

method.name: add
method.description: Alias for world.add().
method.param: being The Being to add to the World associated with this Map.

method.name: remove
method.description: Alias for world.remove().
method.param: being The Being to remove from the World associated with this Map.
destroy Whether or not to deconstruct the target Being after removal.

classRec.name: Being
classRec.description:
A Being is an object that lives in a World. It can define graphics and a physics body. It
should be used as the base class for all of your gameplay objects within a World like trees,
enemies, loot, projectiles, the main hero, etc. Because a Being is used to describe any
element that could appear within a World, it can be also used to represent less obvious items
like health bars and text that is attached to certain positions within the World.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: Being
method.description: Constructor.

method.name: alignBody
method.description:
Position and rotate the physics body owned by this Being to mimic its graphics.
This method does nothing unless this Being owns both a physics body and graphics.

method.name: alignGraphics
method.description:
Position and rotate the graphics owned by this Being to mimic its physics body.
This method does nothing unless this Being owns both graphics and a physics body.

method.name: create
method.description: Attempts to create a new Being from save data obtained via Being.save().
method.param: type The type of object to try and create, as a fully qualified class name.
data The save data.
method.csharp: Change to something more useful like public T Create(...) where T : new(), Being.

method.name: deconstruct
method.description:
Deconstruct this Being. Also deconstructs its graphics and physics body. If this Being
belongs to a World, it will remove itself from it.

method.name: defineBody
method.description:
Defines a physics body to be used by this Being. The body is defined when this Being is
added to a World.
method.param: engine A reference to the physics engine.

method.name: defineGraphics
method.description:
Defines graphics to be used by this Being. Graphics are defined when this Being is added
to a World.

method.name: load
method.description: Applies properties stored in a simple object to this Being.
method.param: data The data to apply.

method.name: moveTo
method.description: Utility to method for setting the x and y values at the same time.
method.param: x The new x coordinate.
y The new y coordinate.

method.name: removeFromParent
method.description: Removes this Being from its parent World.
method.param: destroy Whether or not to also deconstruct() this Being.

method.name: save
method.description: Saves a simple representation of this Being, useful for working with Being.create().

method.name: body
method.description: The physics body used by this Being.

method.name: graphics
method.description: The graphics representing this Being.

method.name: map
method.description: The Map loaded by the parent World containing this Being.

method.name: position
method.description: Returns the position of this Being. Modifying the x or y values of the result will not affect this Being, use moveTo() or modify the x and y values of this Being directly instead.

method.name: rotation
method.description: Get or set the rotation of this Being.

method.name: ui
method.description: Returns the active UI, if this Being is a descendant of GameplayState.

method.name: world
method.description: The parent World containing this Being.

method.name: x
method.description: Get or set the x position of this Being. This is an alias for position.x and moveTo(value, y).

method.name: y
method.description: Get or set the y position of this Being. This is an alias for position.y and moveTo(x, value).

classRec.name: Boundary
classRec.description:
An invisible boundary within a world, usually used with a collection of smaller display-only
Beings e.g. a group of plants, a patch of water, etc.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

classRec.name: BaseWorld
classRec.description:
The World is the core class for dealing with collections of Beings and the interactions
between those Beings. The World also deals with initializing a physics engine, if required.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: BaseWorld
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: engineDef An EngineDef describing the physics engine.
debug A Debug instance describing the type of debugging to use.

method.name: add
method.description: Adds a Being to this World.
method.param: being The Being to add.

method.name: deconstruct
method.description: Deconstruct this World and all the Beings within it.

method.name: defineServices
method.description: Returns a list of services to attach to this World.

method.name: getFromGroup
method.description: Returns a single Being from the specified group with a given name within that group.
method.param: groupName The group name.
nameInGroup The name of the Being within the group.

method.name: getGroup
method.description: Returns a list of Beings who belong to the specified group.
method.param: groupName The group name.

method.name: getService
method.description: Returns a WorldService with the specified name.
method.param: name The name of the WorldService to find.

method.name: getUnique
method.description: Returns a Being who implements IUnique and matches the specified unique name.
method.param: uniqueName The uniqueName value of the saught IUnique Being.

method.name: loadMap
method.description: Loads a new Map into this World.
method.param: map The Map to load.

method.name: query
method.description: Queries the World for a collection of Beings meeting a given criteria. The result Beings are contained within a WorldQueryResult, which provides additional information about the query made.
method.param: query The query to use.

method.name: registerBeingTypes
method.description: Register the list of classes extending Being that are used by this game. This allows Being.create() to function correctly.

method.name: remove
method.description: Removes a Being from this World.
method.param: being The Being to remove.
destroy Whether or not to also deconstruct the Being once removed.

method.name: unloadMap
method.description:
Unload the current Map, if one exists. This will remove all Beings that currently exist
within the World.

classRec.name: BoundaryBox
classRec.description: A boundary made up of four exterior Edge shapes.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

classRec.name: WorldService
classRec.description: Provides a service to be used by the World, e.g. an enemy spawner, pickup generator, etc.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

interfaceRec.name: IPositionProvider
interfaceRec.description:
A contract defining an object that is able to provide its position. The meaning of an object's
position is defined by the object itself. Most likely, the position of an object describes
the position of graphics representing it.
interfaceRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: moveTo
method.description: Simultaneously update the x and y values of this object's position.
method.param: x The new x value.
y The new y value.

method.name: position
rotation
method.description: The rotation of this object.

method.name: x
method.description: The x position of this object.

method.name: y
method.description: The y position of this object.

classRec.name: Compass
classRec.description:
The Compass utility provides methods for translating compass directions into more useful data
structures e.g. degrees, vectors, etc.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

classRec.name: Event
classRec.description: Sentinel Event class.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: Event
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: type The event type.
data Arbitrary event data.

classRec.name: Viewport
classRec.description: Describes the game viewport (screen).
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

classRec.name: ContactEvent
classRec.description: An event holding contact data between two Bodies.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: ContactEvent
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: type The contact type. Can be B2ContactEvent.BEGIN or B2ContactEvent.END.
base The internal Box2D.Dynamics.Contacts.b2Contact instance.
localFixture The fixture associated with the listening body.
localBody The body listening for contact with another.
externalFixture The fixture who the listening body came into contact with.
externalBody The body who the listening body came into contact with.

method.name: externalBody
method.description: The body coming into contact with the listening body.

method.name: externalFixture
method.description: The fixture associated with the body coming into contact with the listening body.

method.name: externalOwner
method.description: The Thing that owns the body coming into contact with the listening body.

method.name: localBody
method.description: The body listening for a contact event.

method.name: localFixture
method.description: The fixture associated with the body listening for a contact event.

method.name: localOwner
method.description: The Thing that owns the body listening for a contact event.

classRec.name: BaseUI
classRec.description:
The UI is a graphics layer typically on top of the World, most commonly used as the in-game
heads up display (e.g. for displaying health bars, etc).
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

classRec.name: GameplayState
classRec.description:
The GameplayState is the base class for your gameplay logic. It is responsible for initializing
a World and a UI, as well as bridging the two.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

method.name: GameplayState
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: world The World to initialize the GameplayState with.
ui The UI to initialize the GameplayState with.

method.name: ui
method.description: The UI used by this GameplayState.

method.name: world
method.description: The World used by this GameplayState.

classRec.name: Audio
classRec.description: The Audio class assists with playing audio in your game.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

classRec.name: Sound
classRec.description: A Sound managed by the Audio component.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.

classRec.name: TestMenu
classRec.description:
A test menu state, providing a way to easily create some buttons quickly for a test only or
temporary gam menu.
classRec.author: Marty Wallace.
